name: zoho_mail
description: Zoho Mail is a secure and ad-free email hosting platform with collaboration tools, calendar integration, and extensive administrative controls

tools.name: ZOHO_MAIL_DOMAIN_OPERATIONS
tools.description: Tool to perform domain operations like verify, set primary domain, hosting, aliases, MX/SPF checks, DKIM management, and notifications. Use after creating or retrieving a domain.

inputSchema.title: DomainsDomainOperationsRequest

mode.title: Mode
mode.description: Operation to perform on the domain

dkimId.title: Dkim Id
dkimId.description: DKIM record ID; required for certain DKIM operations

region.title: Region
region.description: Optional Zoho data center domain to target. One of: 'com', 'eu', 'in', 'com.au', 'jp', 'ca'.

keySize.title: Key Size
keySize.description: DKIM key size (1024 or 2048); required for addDkimDetail

isDefault.title: Is Default
isDefault.description: Make this DKIM record the default; optional for addDkimDetail

domainName.title: Domain Name
domainName.description: Fully qualified domain name to operate on

domainAlias.title: Domain Alias
domainAlias.description: Alias domain name; required for alias operations

use_bearer_auth.title: Use Bearer Auth
use_bearer_auth.description: If true, keeps 'Bearer <token>' Authorization header; otherwise converts to 'Zoho-oauthtoken <token>'.

inputSchema.description:
Tool to perform domain operations like verify, set primary, hosting, aliases,
MX/SPF checks, DKIM management, and notifications. Use after creating or retrieving a domain.

tools.name: ZOHO_MAIL_GROUPS_DELETE_GROUP_BULK

inputSchema.title: GroupsDeleteGroupBulkRequest

zoid.title: Zoid
zoid.description: Unique Zoho Organization Identifier; fetch via Get Organization Details API.

region.title: Region
region.description: Optional Zoho data center domain to target. One of: 'com', 'eu', 'in', 'com.au', 'jp', 'ca'.

groupList.title: Group List
groupList.description: Array of zgid values (group IDs) to delete.

use_bearer_auth.title: Use Bearer Auth
use_bearer_auth.description: If true, keeps 'Bearer <token>' Authorization header; otherwise converts to 'Zoho-oauthtoken <token>'.

inputSchema.description: Request model for bulk deleting groups in Zoho Mail.

region.title: Region
region.description: Optional Zoho data center domain to target. One of: 'com', 'eu', 'in', 'com.au', 'jp', 'ca'.

use_bearer_auth.title: Use Bearer Auth
use_bearer_auth.description: If true, keeps 'Bearer <token>' Authorization header; otherwise converts to 'Zoho-oauthtoken <token>'.

tools.name: ZOHO_MAIL_ORGANIZATION_UPDATE_SPAM_PROCESS_TYPE
tools.description: Tool to update organization spam processing type. Use when changing the spam filtering strategy for an organization.

region.title: Region
region.description: Optional Zoho data center domain to target. One of: 'com', 'eu', 'in', 'com.au', 'jp', 'ca'.

spamProcessType.title: Spam Process Type
spamProcessType.description: Spam filtering level; one of Off, complete, content, sender, sender_header

use_bearer_auth.title: Use Bearer Auth

tools.name: ZOHO_MAIL_ORGANIZATION_UPDATE_USER_STORAGE
tools.description: Tool to modify a user's base or add-on storage allocation. Use when adjusting storage plan for a user within an organization after confirming the IDs.

inputSchema.title: OrganizationUpdateUserStorageRequest

zuid.title: Zuid
zuid.description: Mailbox user ID to update storage for.

region.title: Region
region.description: Optional Zoho data center domain to target. One of: 'com', 'eu', 'in', 'com.au', 'jp', 'ca'.

planType.title: Plan Type
planType.description: Base plan to set; required when mode='updateBaseStorage'.

addonType.title: Addon Type
addonType.description: Extra storage add-on(s); required when mode='updateExtraStorage'. Each item must be '<size>:<units>' where size is one of 5gb,25gb,50gb,100gb,200gb.

use_bearer_auth.title: Use Bearer Auth
use_bearer_auth.description: If true, keeps 'Bearer <token>' Authorization header; otherwise converts to 'Zoho-oauthtoken <token>'.

inputSchema.description: Request schema for updating a user's base or extra storage allocation within an organization.
